name: Refugees Welcome Greece
description: "Refugees Welcome" is a voluntary initiative for the establishment of a different way of welcoming and creating community living for, and together with, refugees in Greece. Our goal is to ensure appropriate housing for refugees through the promotion of cohabitation and flat-sharing. We want to contribute to the creation of an open society, where a warm welcome and solidarity is the norm.
